Module com.example.navalbattleminiproject3
Package com.example.navalbattleminiproject3.model.board.Board

Class BotBoard

java.lang.Object
com.example.navalbattleminiproject3.model.board.Board.BoardAdapter
com.example.navalbattleminiproject3.model.board.Board.BotBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
IBoard, Serializable
public class BotBoard extends BoardAdapter
Represents the bot's game board, extending BoardAdapter. Provides methods for boat spawning, shooting at the player's board, and managing game state.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • BotBoard

      public BotBoard()
      Constructor initializes the bot's board and randomly places the boats. Also sets up the list of boats and their initial positions.

    • randomBoatGeneration

      public String[] randomBoatGeneration(int boatNumber)
      Generates a random boat position on the bot's board. Attempts to place the boat in an empty space with the specified length and direction.
      Specified by:
      randomBoatGeneration in interface IBoard
      Overrides:
      randomBoatGeneration in class BoardAdapter
      Parameters:
      boatNumber - the length of the boat.
      Returns:
      an array of strings representing the positions of the boat on the grid.

    • randomShootInOtherBoard

      Overrides:

      Parameters:

    • isWinnner

      public boolean isWinnner()
      Checks if the bot has won the game by sinking all of the player's boats.
      Returns:
      true if the bot has won, false otherwise.
